dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY') invoice_date, (SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER') invoice_number, (SELECT sr.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sr WHERE sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' AND sr.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND rownum = 1) bl_num, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1),'999990')) || ' X ' || (SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(ssu.received_ship_unit_count,'999,999')) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' FT CONTAINERS' container_count FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_xid contract_number, obrn1.ob_refnum_value party, (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn2.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn3.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn4.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrn4.ob_refnum_value END) address, (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn5.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn6.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn7.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn8.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || (SELECT country_name FROM country_code WHERE country_code3_gid = obrn8.ob_refnum_value) END) city_state_zip, obr1.remark_text credit_number, obr2.remark_text description FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr2.order_base_gid AND obr2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_DESC GOODS SERVICES' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn1.order_base_gid AND obrn1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NOTIFY NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn2.order_base_gid AND obrn2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn3.order_base_gid AND obrn3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn4.order_base_gid AND obrn4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn5.order_base_gid AND obrn5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn6.order_base_gid AND obrn6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn7.order_base_gid AND obrn7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn8 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn8.order_base_gid AND obrn8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP COUNTRY CODE' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID UNION ALL SELECT '' contract_number, '' party, '' address, '' city_state_zip, '' credit_number, '' description FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT s.shipment_gid FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID)

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.s_ship_unit_gid),'999,990')) containers, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(ROUND(a.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)),'999,999,990.000')) gross_wt_mt, NVL(a.dockage, 0) dockage, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SUM(ROUND(a.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) * (CASE WHEN a.dockage = 0 THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(a.dockage) / 100 END)),'999,999,990.000')) dockage_mt, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(ROUND(a.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) - (SUM(ROUND(a.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) * (CASE WHEN a.dockage = 0 THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(a.dockage) / 100 END)),'999,999,990.000')) net_wt_mt FROM (SELECT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.unit_net_weight_base, NVL(ssur.refnum_value, 0) dockage FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ACT PRODUCT SPEC_DOCKAGE_MAX' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sstopd.stop_num = 1) a GROUP BY a.dockage

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(b.gross_wt_mt),'999,999,990.000')) gross_wt_mt_tot, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(b.dockage_mt),'999,999,990.000')) dockage_mt_tot, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(b.net_wt_mt),'999,999,990.000')) net_wt_mt_tot FROM (SELECT SUM(ROUND(a.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) gross_wt_mt, ROUND(SUM(ROUND(a.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) * (CASE WHEN a.dockage = 0 THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(a.dockage) / 100 END),3) dockage_mt, ROUND(SUM(ROUND(a.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) - (SUM(ROUND(a.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) * (CASE WHEN a.dockage = 0 THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(a.dockage) / 100 END)),3) net_wt_mt FROM (SELECT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.unit_net_weight_base, NVL(ssur.refnum_value, 0) dockage FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ACT PRODUCT SPEC_DOCKAGE_MAX' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sstopd.stop_num = 1) a GROUP BY a.dockage) b
SELECT adjustment_num, adjustment_description, '$' || adjustment_amount_formatted || ' USD' adjustment_amount FROM VIEW_SHIP_UNIT_ADJUST_DETAIL WHERE shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(b.net_wt_mt) * b.price,2),'999,999,990.00')) sub_total_amount, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(b.net_wt_mt) * b.price - (CASE WHEN b.total_adjustment_amount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.total_adjustment_amount END),2),'999,999,990.00')) total_amount FROM (SELECT a.net_wt_mt, suat.total_adjustment_amount, TO_NUMBER(NVL((SELECT obr.remark_text FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND NOT oob.order_base_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN ob_remark obr ON oob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_PRICE' WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1),'0')) price FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sstopd.shipment_gid, SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) gross_wt_mt, (SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) * (CASE WHEN ssur.refnum_value IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(ssur.refnum_value) / 100 END)) dockage_mt, ROUND(SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) - (SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) * (CASE WHEN ssur.refnum_value IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(ssur.refnum_value) / 100 END)),3) net_wt_mt FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ACT PRODUCT SPEC_DOCKAGE_MAX' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 GROUP BY sstopd.shipment_gid, ssur.refnum_value) a LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIP_UNIT_ADJUST_TOTAL suat ON a.shipment_gid = suat.shipment_gid) b GROUP BY b.price, b.total_adjustment_amount
